dialogs.text: Hi, welcome to cafeteria, etc etc what do you want.
All out. We got sandwiches, though. Can't even tell the difference. Want one?

choices.text: No, I only need a cookie.

dialogs.text: Here ya go. And if you upgrade to the ultra deluxe meal plan you can get a super triple layered deluxe sandwich instead. Or maybe just an extra drink, idk.
